definition.name: Docker Hub Description
definition.description: An action to update a Docker Hub repository description from README.md
definition.author: Peter Evans

inputs.name: password
inputs.description: Docker Hub password or Personal Access Token with read/write/delete scope

inputs.name: repository
inputs.description: Docker Hub repository in the format `<namespace>/<name>` Default: `github.repository`

inputs.name: readme-filepath
inputs.description: Path to the repository readme Default: `./README.md`

inputs.name: enable-url-completion
inputs.description: Enables completion of relative URLs to absolute ones Default: `false`

inputs.name: image-extensions
inputs.description: File extensions that will be treated as images Default: `bmp,gif,jpg,jpeg,png,svg,webp`
